---

## âš¡ Quick Start

```bash
git clone https://github.com/UTTAM-VAGHASIA/fluttercraft.git
cd fluttercraft
python -m venv venv
.\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1  # On Windows
# source venv/bin/activate   # On macOS/Linux
pip install -e .
fluttercraft start
```
